channel.title: [508] 2 item questions [508]
channel.description: how do you make items untradeable and unspawnable in a 508 source?

item.title: [508] 2 item questions [508]
item.dc:creator: @cheese_0wnz cheese 0wnz
item.description:
@cheese_0wnz wrote:

umm this is for pali you item command should look like this…

if (cmd[0].equals("item")) { if (p.rights <= 1) { if (p.duelFight()) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items while dueling."); return; } if (Server.engine.wildernessArea(p.absX, p.absY)) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn items in the wilderness."); return; } if (cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot spawn that."); return; }

		    }
                	    Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));
            	}

now if (cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || cmd[1].equals("1") || replace the 1’s with the id of the unspawnable item done (:

idk how to make stuff untradeable though sorry
